00074     typedef void* EntityHandle;
00075     
00076     
00077       // We typedef specific types of EntityHandles just
00078       // to make it clear what kind of entity is to be
00079       // returned or used as a function parameter, but the
00080       // different handle types are not actually distinct.
00081     typedef EntityHandle VertexHandle;

00485 
00486 inline size_t Mesquite::vertices_in_topology(Mesquite::EntityTopology topo)
00487 {
00488   return TopologyInfo::corners( topo );
00489 }
